Web Service Discovery For Windows Networ.description:
Samba (SMB) Network folder visibility in Windows 10 v1511 or later. Intended for local network workgroup setups only.

Note: uses `net=host` to enable core functionality.

Based on the official OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

WSDDN_WORKGROUP.description: Workgroup name. Must be the same name used during the setup of the Samba service on the Rockstor appliance.
WSDDN_WORKGROUP.label: Workgroup [e.g. WORKGROUP]
